title: CloudFormation Resource Type Configuration Schema
description: This schema validates the CFN resource type configuration that could be set by customers

UpdateReplaceConfiguration.description: Attribute to retain or, in some cases, backup the existing physical instance of a resource when it's replaced during a stack update operation.

DeletionConfiguration.description: Attribute to preserve, and in some cases, backup the existing physical instance of a resource when it's deleted during a stack update or delete operation.
